name: Shazam
description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com

api_methods.name: shazam-events/list
api_methods.description: List future events

parameters.name: artistId
parameters.description:
The value of 'artist->adamid' field returned in …/search OR …/songs/v2/detect OR …/songs/get-details endpoint
The value of 'artists->id' field returned in …/shazam-songs/get-details OR …/albums/get-details OR …/albums/get-related-artist

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The language code

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The date to list events from

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per page, for paging purpose

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The page index, for paging purpose

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The date to list events to. Ex : 2023-01-15

api_methods.name: artists/get-latest-release
api_methods.description: Get latest release of an artist

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
The value of 'artist->adamid' field returned in .../search OR .../songs/v2/detect OR .../songs/get-details endpoint
The value of 'artists->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details OR .../albums/get-details OR .../albums/get-related-artist

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: artists/get-summary
api_methods.description: Get summary information related to an artist

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
The value of 'artist->adamid' field returned in .../search OR .../songs/v2/detect OR .../songs/get-details endpoint
The value of 'artists->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details OR .../albums/get-details OR .../albums/get-related-artist

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: songs/detect
api_methods.description:
You may check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/shazam/tutorials.
Detect songs from raw sound data. The raw sound data must be 44100Hz, 1 channel (Mono), signed 16 bit PCM little endian. Other types of media are NOT supported, such as : mp3, wav, etc... or need to be converted to uncompressed raw data. If the result is empty, your request data must be in wrong format in most case. Encoded base64 string of byte[] that generated from raw data less than 500KB (3-5 seconds sample are good enough for detection) will be sent via body as plain text

api_methods.name: songs/get-related-artist
api_methods.description: Get artist related to a song

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of 'songs->id' field returned from .../shazam-songs/get-details endpoint

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: songs/v2/get-details
api_methods.description: Get details information of specific song

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of 'songs->id' field returned from .../shazam-songs/get-details endpoint

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: songs/v2/detect
api_methods.description:
You may check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/shazam/tutorials.
Detect songs from raw sound data. The raw sound data must be 44100Hz, 1 channel (Mono), signed 16 bit PCM little endian. Other types of media are NOT supported, such as : mp3, wav, etc... or need to be converted to uncompressed raw data. If the result is empty, your request data must be in wrong format in most case. Encoded base64 string of byte[] that generated from raw data less than 500KB (3-5 seconds sample are good enough for detection) will be sent via body as plain text

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: User's timezone

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This parameter is used to indicate that you are detecting the same song while making different calls in case the previous portion of sound cannot be recognized successfully. You simply use the same unix timestamp (milliseconds) which is the starting time of first sound portion of detecting progress. This parameter must be come along with \"samplems\" parameter. Ex : 1591884466431

constraints.inter-dependency: timestamp, samplems: timestamp must be provided along with samplems.

parameters.name: samplems
parameters.description: The samplems in milliseconds including the total duration of previous sound portions if any. Otherwise just provide the samplems of the current sound portion. Ex : First portion is 5040, second portion is 9040, etc...

constraints.inter-dependency: timestamp, samplems: samplems must be provided along with timestamp.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description:
This parameter is used to indicate that you are detecting the same song while making different calls in case the previous portion of sound cannot be recognized successfully. You simply use the same id string while detecting the same song. This parameter must be come along with \"samplems\" parameter.
The format is xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx, Ex : 21abe4d2-0fe9-4be4-8492-0ecf26960f7e.

constraints.inter-dependency: identifier, samplems: identifier must be provided along with samplems.

api_methods.name: songs/get-details
api_methods.description: Get details information of specific song

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: songs/get-count
api_methods.description: Get total times the specific song is detected/shazamed by using .../songs/detect or .../songs/v2/detect endpoint

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

api_methods.name: songs/list-recommendations
api_methods.description: List related ones to a specific song.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key field returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: songs/list-artist-top-tracks (Deprecated)
api_methods.description: List top tracks of specific artist

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id field inside artists json object returned from .../songs/detect or .../search endpoint

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: albums/get-related-artist
api_methods.description: Get artist related to an album

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
The value of 'albums->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details OR .../artists/get-albums OR .../artists/get-summary
The value of 'id' field returned in .../artists/get-albums OR .../artists/get-latest-release endpoint
The value of 'albumadamid' field returned in .../songs/v2/detect OR .../songs/detect endpoint

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: albums/get-details
api_methods.description: Get detailed album of an album

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
The value of 'albums->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details OR .../artists/get-albums OR .../artists/get-summary
The value of 'id' field returned in .../artists/get-albums OR .../artists/get-latest-release endpoint
The value of 'albumadamid' field returned in .../songs/v2/detect OR .../songs/detect endpoint

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: shazam-songs/list-similarities
api_methods.description: Get similar (You may also like) songs

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of 'related-tracks->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details endpoint

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: shazam-songs/get-details
api_methods.description: Get mapping id information between systems to use with other endpoints.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The value of 'id' field returned in .../search endpoint

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: artists/get-top-songs
api_methods.description: Get top songs of an artist

The value of 'artist->adamid' field returned in .../search OR .../songs/v2/detect OR .../songs/get-details endpoint
The value of 'artists->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details OR .../albums/get-details OR .../albums/get-related-artist

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.description: Get detailed information of an artist

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
The value of 'artist->adamid' field returned in .../search OR .../songs/v2/detect OR .../songs/get-details endpoint
The value of 'artists->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details OR .../albums/get-details OR .../albums/get-related-artist

api_methods.name: charts/list
api_methods.description: List all available charts by cities, countries, and genres

api_methods.name: search
api_methods.description: Search for songs, artists that match input term

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Full name of songs or artists

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: For paging purpose, maximum is fixed at 5 items per response

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: For paging purpose

api_methods.name: auto-complete
api_methods.description: Get suggestions by word or phrase

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Any word or phrase of song, artist, etc... that you are familiar with

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: charts/track
api_methods.description: Get all popular songs in specific chart

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The value of listId field returned in .../charts/list endpoint

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Used for paging purpose, 20 items per response is maximum.

parameters.name: startFrom
parameters.description: Used for paging purpose.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language code

api_methods.name: songs/detect
api_methods.description:
You may check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/shazam/tutorials.
Detect songs from raw sound data. The raw sound data must be 44100Hz, 1 channel (Mono), signed 16 bit PCM little endian. Other types of media are NOT supported, such as : mp3, wav, etc... or need to be converted to uncompressed raw data. If the result is empty, your request data must be in wrong format in most case. Encoded base64 string of byte[] that generated from raw data less than 500KB (3-5 seconds sample are good enough for detection) will be sent via body as plain text
